DataConnector - Class in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The class DataConnector partially implements a basic data connector where components call each others using plain Java method calls only.
DataConnector() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.DataConnector
 
DataConnectorI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The interface BasicDataConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others.
DataInboundPortI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.ports
The interface DataInboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than being called for their services.
DataOfferedI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataOfferedI defines a basic interface for components that exchange raw data rather than calling each others services.
DataOfferedI.DataI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataOfferedI.DataI provides for a generic type of data produced by the offering component.
DataOfferedI.PullI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataOfferedI.PullI contains the signatures of the methods that can be called by the requiring components to get data from the offering component.
DataOfferedI.PushI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataOfferedI.PushI contains the signatures of the methods that are called by the offering component to send data to the requiring component.
DataOutboundPortI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.ports
The interface DataOutboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than calling providers for their services.
DataRequiredI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataRequiredI defines a basic interface for components that exchange raw data rather than calling each others services.
DataRequiredI.DataI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataRequiredI.DataI provides for a generic type of data expected by the requiring component.
DataRequiredI.PullI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataRequiredI.PullI contains the signatures of the methods that can be called by the requiring components to get data from the offering component.
DataRequiredI.PushI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface DataRequiredI.PushI contains the signatures of the methods that are called by the offering component to send data to the requiring component.
DataTwoWayConnector - Class in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The class DataTwoWayConnector implements a standard connector for components exchanging data in a peer-to-peer mode using standard data two-way interfaces.
DataTwoWayConnector() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.DataTwoWayConnector
 
DataTwoWayConnectorI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
DataTwoWayI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface TwoWayDataI enables two components to exchange data in a peer-to-peer way, that is the two components implement the same interface and have both the sender and receiver roles.
DataTwoWayI.DataI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface TwoWayDataI.DataI is a marker for data that can be exchanged between components using a two-way data interface.
DataTwoWayI.PullI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface TwoWayDataI.PullI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to get data from the other component.
DataTwoWayI.PushI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.interfaces
The interface TwoWayDataI.PushI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to send data to the other component.
DataTwoWayPortI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.ports
The interface DataTwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for exchanging data among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
DCVMCyclicBarrier - Class in fr.upmc.components.cvm.utils
The class DCVMCyclicBarrier implements a synchronisation mechanism, known as a cyclic barrier, in a distributed way, and to be used by DCVM to synchronise at important steps in the deployment, execution and shutting down of distributed component-based applications.
DCVMCyclicBarrier(String) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrier
create a distributed cyclic barrier for a given assembly, as described by its configuration file.
DCVMCyclicBarrierClient - Class in fr.upmc.components.cvm.utils
The class DCVMCyclicBarrierClient implements the client side of the distributed cyclic wait barrier mechanism.
DCVMCyclicBarrierClient(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrierClient
create the client side object implementing the wait behaviour.
